full_text: 305-9312200 Herman &Mermelstein, P 11:43:41 a.m. 20-03-2008 3 /4 HERMAN & MERMELSTEIN PA ATTORNEYS AT LAW Jeffrey M. Herman Tel 305.931.2200 Fax 305.931.0877 jherman@hermanlaw.com 18205 Biscayne Blvd. Suite 2218 Miami, Florida 33160 www.hermanlaw.com March 20, 2008 Via Facsimile and U.S. Mail Jack A. Goldberger, Esq. 250 Australian Avenue South Suite 1400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401 Re: State of Florida v. Jeffrey E. Epstein Case No.: 2006CF009454AXX Dear Mr. Goldberger: As you know, we represent in all matters pertaining to Jeffrey Epstein. We understand that you scheduled Ms. for deposition on April 2, 2008. We would like to reschedule the deposition to a date convenient for Ms. : and myself. In addition, we would like to conduct a single deposition to be used for both the criminal and the civil matters. Please let us know if you will agree to this or if we should seek court approval for same. Of course, we understand that the State Attorney's Office will need to agree to this as well, and we have not yet contacted them for approval. Sincerely Jeffrey M. Herman JMH/lr cc: Lanna Leigh Belohlavek, Asst. State Attorney 07/26/17 Page 10 of 94 Public Records Request No.: 17-295

text_blocks.content: HERMAN & MERMELSTEIN PA ATTORNEYS AT LAW
Jeffrey M. Herman Tel 305.931.2200 Fax 305.931.0877 jherman@hermanlaw.com 18205 Biscayne Blvd. Suite 2218 Miami, Florida 33160 www.hermanlaw.com
Via Facsimile and U.S. Mail Jack A. Goldberger, Esq. 250 Australian Avenue South Suite 1400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
Re: State of Florida v. Jeffrey E. Epstein Case No.: 2006CF009454AXX

As you know, we represent in all matters pertaining to Jeffrey Epstein. We understand that you scheduled Ms. for deposition on April 2, 2008. We would like to reschedule the deposition to a date convenient for Ms. : and myself. In addition, we would like to conduct a single deposition to be used for both the criminal and the civil matters. Please let us know if you will agree to this or if we should seek court approval for same. Of course, we understand that the State Attorney's Office will need to agree to this as well, and we have not yet contacted them for approval.
JMH/lr cc: Lanna Leigh Belohlavek, Asst. State Attorney
07/26/17 Page 10 of 94 Public Records Request No.: 17-295

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Jeffrey M. Herman to Jack A. Goldberger regarding the case State of Florida v. Jeffrey E. Epstein. The letter is dated March 20, 2008, and is on the letterhead of Herman & Mermelstein, P.A. The document has been redacted to remove the name of a person. The document is part of a larger collection, as indicated by the page number '10 of 94' and the 'Public Records Request No.: 17-295'.
